name: decolagem-system
description: Sistema de gestão CRM Social + ERP Simplificado para programas As Maras, Microcrédito e Decolagem

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:backend -- --fix && npm run lint:frontend -- --fix
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:frontend
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npm run migration:revert && npm run migration:run && npm run seed
scripts.docker:rebuild: docker-compose down && docker-compose build --no-cache && docker-compose up -d
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.vercel-build: npm --prefix backend install --legacy-peer-deps && npm --prefix backend run vercel-build && npm --prefix frontend install --legacy-peer-deps && npm --prefix frontend run build && if exist index.html del index.html && if exist assets rmdir /s /q assets && xcopy frontend\dist\* . /s /e /y && if exist api\_backend_dist rmdir /s /q api\_backend_dist && mkdir api\_backend_dist && xcopy backend\dist\* api\_backend_dist\ /s /e /y && copy backend\dist\server.js api\server.js && copy backend\dist\server.js api\server.mjs

author: Decolagem Team
